lifeboatstations.name: Tramore Lifeboat Station
lifeboatstations.description: Boats: 'Tra Mhor' and 'Isabella Purchase'. During its 110-year history the crews have been honoured with 18 awards for gallantry.

lifeboatstations.name: Dunmore East Lifeboat Station
lifeboatstations.description: Trent class AWL 'Elizabeth and Ronald'. The crew have been awarded sixteen medals, eight Silver and eight Bronze, the last being voted in 1976

lifeboatstations.name: Baltimore Lifeboat Station
lifeboatstations.description: AWL 'Alan Massey' and inshore lifeboat 'Alice and Charles'

newLifeboatstation.name: Castletownbere lifeboat station
newLifeboatstation.description: AWL 'Annette Hutton', class Trent. New pontoon opened in 2013
